pageContext.claim: “Caught in the act! [quoting a tweet that falsely says Samantha Power made at least seven requests to ‘unmask’ Michael Flynn]”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's accusation that Barack Obama, Joe Biden and other top administration officials "unmasked" Michael Flynn (meaning, ordered that a name be unredacted in a classified transcript) quickly fell apart. The Washington Post reported that Flynn was not among the individuals who were "unmasked" at the request of top Obama administration officials including Biden.
